channel.title: Need a small code
channel.description:
hey i just found out a good idea xD and to do that idea i need a code... im not a coder, so i cant make it self... im learning java but it takes time... so here is what i kinda think of.
there is an item, a casket. and when i right click it, it says open use exmine... and i want that open to work.. and i want to have a casket.CFG that i put items and amout and % chanse to be in the casket... so it wil randomly get those items and so meny.. and next time some other items...
and if its posible to make:
make the spade to dig. not sure if it works now. but make it to dig. and its 10% change to get a casket wit hrandom items in it...
so if you know how to code this could you help me :D

item.title: Need a small code
item.dc:creator: @tor0en tor0en

@tor0en wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:172611”][quote author=tor0en link=topic=232770.msg1991468#msg1991468 date=1200113690]
oh ye… but is it posible to make that item 20% to get in it?
[/quote]
if ((int) (Math.random() * 100) < 20) {
// everything in here has a 20% chance of being executed
}[/quote]

ty but where do i do the rest? where do i add this xD?

item.title: Need a small code
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Use packet 132, clicking the first option on an item.
Use the addItem int to add the reward, and deleteItem to get rid of the casket.

Read full topic
